content: rag: Fortnite is a popular game developed by Epic Games and is available on multiple platforms. It features a large world where players can explore, build structures, and battle against other players. The objective of the game is to be the last player or team standing, and it includes PC as one of the platforms.

external response: Nvidia is an American technology company that specializes in producing graphics processing units (GPUs) for various markets, including gaming, professional, and AI applications. It also manufactures workstations, laptops, and system-on-chips for the automotive market. The company is headquartered in Santa Clara, California.

rag: Fortnite is a popular game developed by Epic Games and is available on multiple platforms. It features a large world where players can explore, build structures, and battle against other players. The objective of the game is to be the last player or team standing, while also avoiding the storm. It can be played on PC, which is one of the platforms it is available on.
